reviews.review: Dr. Smith is an outstanding professor who makes complex topics understandable. Her lectures are well-organized, and she genuinely cares about her students' success.
reviews.subject: Mathematics

reviews.review: Prof. Doe is knowledgeable but can be a bit difficult to follow at times. His exams are challenging, but fair. Make sure to keep up with the readings!
reviews.subject: History

reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very passionate about her subject, but her grading is quite harsh. Attend all her classes and participate to do well.
reviews.subject: Literature

reviews.review: Prof. Brown's classes are engaging, and he always makes time for student questions. His assignments are practical and relevant to the industry.
reviews.subject: Computer Science

reviews.review: Dr. White is a tough but fair grader. Her lectures are informative, though sometimes a bit dry. Make sure to take good notes.
reviews.subject: Chemistry

reviews.review: Dr. Green has a deep understanding of the subject, but his lectures can be a bit monotonous. However, his office hours are extremely helpful.
reviews.subject: Physics

reviews.review: Prof. Wilson is very approachable and creates a positive learning environment. Her assignments are well thought out and help reinforce the material.
reviews.subject: Psychology

reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is a very demanding professor, but you will learn a lot if you put in the effort. His lectures are fast-paced, so be prepared!
reviews.subject: Economics

reviews.review: Prof. King is a fantastic professor who is very enthusiastic about her subject. Her exams are straightforward if you attend her lectures.
reviews.subject: Biology

reviews.review: Dr. Davis is very knowledgeable, but his lectures can be overwhelming. His assignments are challenging, but they really help you understand the material.
reviews.subject: Engineering
